alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued April 01 at 2:00AM PDT until April 02 at 11:00PM PDT by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 PM PDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 18 inches, except 14 to 30 inches above 2500 feet. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until 11 PM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map
